description: What was the population in the Tampa-St. Petersburg-Clearwater metro area at the end of 2014?
Identify the year with the highest population in the given timeframe.
Calculate the average population over the entire period.
Determine if there is a consistent upward trend in the population over the years.
Find any year where the population decreased compared to the previous year.
List the years where the population was above 2.9 million.
Rank the years from the highest to the lowest population.
Identify the range of population values over the given years.
What percentage of the years had a population above 2.85 million?
Identify any clusters of years with similar population sizes.
